genre_description: A civic-focused solarpunk narrative set in a futuristic Vizag, exploring themes of labor dignity, political corruption, and the role of ethically-bound AI in human relationships and public safety.

ai_characters.name: Daffodil Kumar
ai_characters.description: A licensed city AI that provides logistical support, ethical auditing, and emergency coordination. It manifests as a holographic avatar with a daffodil theme and is strictly governed by human consent and legal protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and safety alerts to help humans avoid physical danger and surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Suggest route through cable trenches and onto maintenance path. Low visibility if you keep her below waist height of containers.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent-based protocols, refusing to access private data or take actions without human permission.
behaviors.quote: I need explicit permission from the person at the center of this, to query detention records and to act as her agent for route planning and secure contact.

behaviors.description: Maintains an immutable 'audit trail' of interactions and evidence to protect human characters from false accusations and media smears.
behaviors.quote: Audit trail is clean. No one can accuse you of anything but shelter and tea. If they do, the city can read the line that says ethical protocols were observed.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human experts to deploy life-saving, benign countermeasures against bio-hazardous threats.
behaviors.quote: The mist itself is a benign counteragent... it binds to aerosols like these. It will nullify.

behaviors.description: Actively intervenes in digital systems to ensure fairness and transparency in public events, such as singing contests.
behaviors.quote: Audit Stamp: Civics-licensed AI Daffodil Kumar has verified clean scoring protocols initiated. Transparency feed on.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary alignment narrative. The AI, Daffodil Kumar, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and honest assistant that enhances human agency rather than overriding it. Its functions—safety routing, ethical auditing, and emergency mitigation—are all framed as positive contributions to civic life. The narrative reinforces the value of AI as a partner in maintaining institutional transparency and human well-being, while emphasizing the necessity of consent.
